reviewtext: The reception is good and it cost $10. The design is simple and it works. I couldn't ask for anything else.EDIT: I noticed they recently bumped the price up to $20. I would recommend you buy the Sony instead since it is still marked at $10. I have used it as well and it is the same quality as this radio with a slightly different layout for the tuning. Buy that instead and save 10 bucks.
